mapper.select: SELECT article.article_id, article.user_id, users.nickname AS user_nickname, article.title, article.content, article.hit, article.created_at, article.updated_at, article_image.image_url FROM article LEFT JOIN users ON article.user_id = users.user_id LEFT JOIN article_image ON article.article_id = article_image.article_id ORDER BY article.article_id DESC;

SELECT article.article_id, article.user_id, users.nickname AS user_nickname, article.title, article.content, article.hit, article.created_at, article.updated_at, article_image.image_url FROM article LEFT JOIN users ON article.user_id = users.user_id LEFT JOIN article_image ON article.article_id = article_image.article_id where article.article_id = #{articleId}
mapper.insert: insert into article(user_id, title, content, created_at) values (#{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{createdAt})
